name: Norway
visaRequirements: Schengen Visa required for most non-EU citizens

about.description: Norway is a Scandinavian country known for its dramatic fjords, stunning natural landscapes, and the mesmerizing Northern Lights. It's famous for its high standard of living, outdoor activities, and Viking history.

travelTips.bestTimeToVisit: June to August for hiking and fjords; December to March for Northern Lights and winter sports
culturalNotes: Norwegians are generally reserved but friendly
Outdoor activities are a major part of life
Tipping is not expected but appreciated
